channel.title: Woodworking on Parker Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Woodworking on Parker Smith

item.title: Cutting Boards and Serving Trays
item.description: Small collection of cutting boards and serving trays I’ve made for family and friends ![PXL_20210104_162606723.PORTRAIT.jpg](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1656614185957/Yt3wbDQuz.jpg align=“left”) ![FKTRj7W - Imgur.jpg](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1656694027405/NwGx2CmwQ.jpg align=“left”) Sports Themed Serving Tray ![Outside_Patio](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1656613943691/GensIq9lT.JPG align=“left”) ![Inside_shop](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1656613818878/3-Xf17Mtr.jpg align=“left”)

item.title: Fine Furniture Making
item.description: Pieces I built from classes at CT Valley Woodworking School.

item.title: Giant wooden hearts on the Connecticut State Capitol lawn
Grandma's Backyard Brook Footbridge
item.description: Before Clearing Brush Teardown Foundation First batch of wood Concrete poured Grandma the Supervisor inspecting our work Layout of beams Measuring, marking, cutting posts By evening the posts were completed Reinforcing beams/stringers More supervisors come by to inspect our work Waterproofing Decking complete Ramp with old telephone poles and rock Final A rough rendering of my sketch during the design phase

item.title: Grandpa's Workshop
item.description: I began my projects on the workbench Grandpa built As my projects increased in size and complexity, I built a larger workbench and organized the tools a bit

item.title: Sailboat Maintenance
item.description: 1986 Galilee 15 sailboat Beam 6'8' Weight 525 lbs Sail Area Main 75 sq. ft. Jib 35 sq. ft. the perfect environment for anyone interested in boatbuilding, repair, design, woodworking, metalworking, sailing, and so much more. Welding Where is my hammer Motor mount for running in a bucket

item.title: Trestle Bed Frame Twin Size
item.description: Credit for the design goes to Craig Stover. https://craig-stover.squarespace.com/flatpack-bedframe
